TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I leave this message seeking help with a matter!
SOLANUM: A scroll I took from within the tower slipped from my grasp as I fell into the pool!
SOLANUM: I dove into the pool, hoping retrieve it; but the long, electrifying tentacles of the pool's inhabitant fiercely guards the scroll at the bottom of the pool!
SOLANUM: I took it from within the tower, hoping to find a whiteboard to read about the settlers' history.. Oh, now there's no way to read it, and I've even polluted a species' habitat at that!
SOLANUM: I feel deeply ashamed to leave this scroll polluting the lifeform's habitat until I return with help - but I have already received a few shocks trying to retrieve it..
SOLANUM: If anyone who finds this message before then is able to beseech the lifeform to budge, to retrieve the scroll safely: I would be most grateful if you would kindly do so in my stead!
